text:
Kaius ir'Wynarn II ascended to the throne of [[Karrnath]] after the mysterious death of his father, [[Kaius I|Kaius ir'Wynarn I]], in 910 YK. He ordered the invasion of [[Cyre]] in 929 YK which led to the brutal and much-maligned sack of [[Metrol]]; for the remainder of his reign, Kaius II contended with reprisals and attacks from the rest of the [[Five Nations]], including the first and second siege of [[Korth]].

Kaius II ruled until his death in 960 YK; his successor was his son Jaron.
title: Kaius ir'Wynarn II
